>***according to the ladies at 3-hajime.com there was an amusing 
>scene where Saitou and Shimada charge at a riceball offered at the 
>Yagi residence or something along those lines...is this true 
>Barbara?  I guess being perpetually hungry is the lot of ronin LOL!  
>When I get more of the series...I am going to have to see this in 
>slow motion ^_^...in the case of Saitou it should be like fighting 
>over the last bottle of sake

In fact, when Miss.Hide says "These riceballs are made by me", first persons 
who stand up and charge at her are Saito and Shimada.
I couldn't notice it at the first view, and couldn't believe after reading 
the blog of a friend which mentions about it, because it wasn't Saito's a 
ttitude for me, I watched the tape again...And I saw Saito doing it.(laugh)
Even Nagakura go straight toward Hide's riceballs and no one seems to be 
interested in Mrs.Yagi's.

Tama
